name: Books Store
description: This PWA, 'Book Finder,' allows users to search for books using the Gutendex API. It dynamically displays book covers, titles, and authors, with options to read books online. The app features pagination for browsing results and includes service worker registration for offline capabilities and a seamless install experience, enhancing user engagement and accessibility.

name: Ai Prompts
description: This PWA, 'Prompt Explorer,' helps users efficiently browse and copy ready-to-use AI prompts. Prompts are organized by subcategories like 'initial prompts' and 'followup prompts,' and further filtered by category. It provides a convenient interface to discover and utilize various AI prompts for different needs, ensuring quick access and easy copying.

name: Logo generator
description:
This 'Logo Generator Pro' web application
  empowers users to create custom logos with
  ease. It offers extensive customization
  options for text, including font styles,
  colors, and effects. Users can also add and
  style various shapes with solid or gradient
  fills, adjust canvas dimensions, and choose
  from quick presets to design unique and
  stunning logos.

name: Games hub
description: 'GameHub' is a PWA designed for discovering free-to-play games across diverse genres and platforms. Users can search, filter by category, and sort games to find new titles. Each game features a detailed card with descriptions, platform information, and a direct link to play. The app provides an intuitive interface for exploring thousands of free games.

name: Media collection
description: This PWA, 'Simple Media Browser,' enables users to efficiently search for openly-licensed images and audio. It offers robust filtering options by license type, source, and specific image or audio categories, simplifying the discovery of creative commons media. The app also features an 'Advice of the Day' widget and pagination for an enhanced browsing experience.

name: Quran Search
description: 'Quran Search' is a PWA designed for searching the Holy Quran. Users can quickly find verses by typing keywords, with an option for auto-search. Search results display detailed Surah and Ayah information, and users can listen to audio recitations of individual verses. The app also allows copying all search results and offers a light/dark theme toggle for enhanced readability.

name: Prompt Generator
description: 'Website Prompt Builder' is a PWA designed to help users generate professional web development prompts. It offers quick-start templates, allows selection of various website components, and provides a visual preview of the chosen elements. The app then generates a comprehensive prompt, which users can copy and utilize with AI development tools to streamline their web project creation process.

name: Images
description: The 'Utility Toolkit' is a versatile PWA offering a suite of image manipulation tools. Users can generate QR codes, create custom icons and favicons from scratch or existing images, and edit hero images with cropping and optimization features. It also includes dedicated tools for generating animated GIFs and resizing images, making it a comprehensive solution for various visual asset needs.

keywords: Disciver Quran, search, read listen, cooy
name: Disciver Quran
description: 'مع القرآن الكريم' (With the Holy Quran) is a comprehensive PWA for exploring the Quran. It enables users to read Arabic verses, access English and Urdu translations, and delve into various Tafsir (exegesis) interpretations. The app also features audio recitations by multiple Qaris, with options for sequential playback, a search function, adjustable font sizes, and a dark mode for comfortable reading.
